name: Chop Chop Run
description:
The game is for Games for Forests (GNOJ#9)

In this game, there is a forest with both trees and a lumberjack. The objective of the lumberjack is to chop down as many trees as possible, while the objective of the trees is to avoid being chopped down by the lumberjack.

The player takes on the role of both the lumberjack and the trees, switching between the two randomly over time.

Gain more points before the countdown ends!
